channel.title: Need help with a vote for money system!
channel.description: hey guys, i need a system for my rsps where they vote on the website and put their username in, and after they have voted 500k appears in their inventory when they next logg in, anyone can help me with this plz?

item.title: Need help with a vote for money system!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Mariokillu:

I believe this is impossible but you can make it when they do ::vote, it adds money but not after they vote but that usually leads to spamming of ::vote.

No its not impossible,

The server Im working on atm has it, but another devoloper added it, not me

But i know for a fact theres plenty of tuts on how to do this

and its not that hard,
just involves a bit of mySql

anyways check the tut section

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a vote for money system!
